title: Free Throws
description: Free Throws is the second book in The Drew Neilson Series. Follow the accomplishments, trials and tribulations of high school star athlete Drew Neilson. In the first book in the series, Touchdowns, Drew had to overcome the tragic death of his girlfriend. With faith and the support of his family, he managed to move on.In Free Throws, Drew seems to have gotten back on his feet. However, he must once again overcome challenges -- this time in the form of poor decision-making on the part of his friends and teammates. Health complications rear their ugly head as well.Despite the obstacles, Drew Neilson continues to display maturity and grit well beyond his years.
author: Neil Kokemuller
